title: ArtyTorrent Pack 90-BFA-Hardcore Breakbeat Action 2-WAV
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 90-BFA-Hardcore Breakbeat Action 2-WAV
-------------------------------------------------------

Hardcore Breakbeat Action is an awesome 4-disc pack from Big Fish Audio. <a href="
http://www.bigfishaudio.com/4dcgi/detail.html?300" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.bigfishaudio.com/4dcgi/detail.html?300</a>

Loops and oneshots are arranged in the construction kit format allowing easy arrangement of songs. The tempo ranges from 129-160 bpm, so there&#039;s something for anyone who likes harsh and fast beats.

This torrent follows on from ATpack 88 and is based on WAV CD 2. I&#039;ve left the directory structure more or less untouched, apart from moving the oneshots into categorized folders after trimming them appropriately.

Torrent contains 2 RAR files with 526 samples
---------------------------------------------
HBA2 Cons Kit Loops (282 loops in 34 kits)
HBA2 Oneshots (244 drum and perc hits, basses and synths)

Files have beeen renamed to prevent confusion (how many samples called bass1.wav have you got already?) and many have also been converted to mono where right and left channels were identical.
Each construction kit folder includes tempo and root key information, and all files are acidized.
Samples are normalized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz.

--
Arty - "The best part of breaking up..."
27th February 2008.
